notifyMe(long, Customer) - Method in interface com.mobcrush.internship.ProductNotifier
This method records a customer's request to be notified when the product becomes available
notifyMe(long, Customer) - Method in class com.mobcrush.internship.ProductNotifierSolution
This method adds the customers interested in the product to a list for simulating purposes; In real world scenario add them to database here using a web service call (ideally a REST based POST request)
